enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces fire damage and decreases burn duration.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces fall damage and ender pearl teleportation damage.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces projectile damage from arrows and fireballs.
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.desc: Extends underwater breathing time and improves visibility.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Inflicts damage on attackers, scaling with level.
enchantment.minecraft.sharpness.desc: Increases melee damage, scaling with level.
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: Extra damage to undead mobs (Zombies, Skeletons, Withers).
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Extra damage to arthropod mobs (Spiders, Silverfish).
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc: Sets targets on fire, duration scales with level.
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc: Increases mob loot drops, scaling with level.
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.desc: Increases mining speed, scaling with level.
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of usual drops.
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Increases block drop yields, scaling with level.
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Arrows set targets on fire, damage scales with level.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Shoot arrows without consuming them (requires at least one arrow). Fired arrows cannot be retrieved.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Decreases chance of fishing junk items.
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Creates ice when walking on water.
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Propels player when throwing trident (water/rain only).
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Summons lightning with trident during thunderstorms.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: Shoots multiple arrows in random directions.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Arrows penetrate multiple targets and shields.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases speed on Soul Sand/Soul Soil.
enchantmentlib.jei.name: Enchantment Details
